news.title: FSFE Newsletter
news.body: Topics: FSFE launches list of recommended Free Software lawyers, FSFE action on IPRED2 "Criminalisation" Directive, Transcript of Richard M. Stallman's speech in Brussels online, FSFE at A2K2 conference in Yale Law School, Georg Greve and Jonas Ã–berg in Belgrade, Serbia, Ivan Jelic joining European Core Team of FSFE, Merchandise available via web order, Get active: join the translation team!.
